pr_title: KEYCLOAK-12414 Remove the need to specify defaults in config file

KEYCLOAK-12414 Remove the need to specify defaults in config file

timeline.bodyText: This new value for the interval seems to be the one we use in our test suite. Do we want to make it the default for the main dist too?
timeline.author: pedroigor

replies.bodyText: 900 is what we use in the WildFly dist
replies.author: stianst
